name: Zup! Z
description:
Minimal physical puzzle with explosions. The player's goal to keep the blue ball on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.

Zup! Z - the continuation of the franchise

▪ 60 Levels
▪ Achievements
▪ New cubes
▪ Lasers

Requires DirectShow to work correctly (K-Lite Codec Pack)

Credits

"Zup!" powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5

The basis is taken an example of Sergio Andre
